message:
Make voice triggers dynamic and configurable

- VoiceHighlight extension now accepts triggers as options
- Triggers stored in React state, ready for backend integration
- Added support for real-time trigger updates via ProseMirror meta
- Clean separation between data (triggers) and UI (components)
